hero.badge: AI-Powered Personalized Visual Art for Viral Marketing
hero.title: Transform Your Photos Into
hero.subtitle: Interactive AI platform using advanced Generative AI to instantly transform your photos into stunning, theme-based visual art with seamless brand integration.

solution.title: Solutions That
solution.subtitle: We solve real marketing challenges with AI-powered personalized content that creates emotional connections and drives organic reach
solution.problem1Desc: Digital advertising fails to grab attention in crowded feeds
solution.problem2Desc: Brands struggle to establish meaningful emotional connections with users
solution.problem3Desc: Traditional campaigns are costly and don't automatically go viral
solution.problem4Desc: Most visual content is generic and not personalized for individual users
solution.solution1Desc: Maximizes voluntary social sharing through personalized content, significantly lowering customer acquisition costs
solution.solution2Desc: Creates personal, positive, and memorable links between brands and users through their own likeness
solution.solution3Desc: Instantly generate millions of unique, branded visuals, overcoming manual creation limitations

team.title: Meet Our

roadmap.title: Our
roadmap.subtitle: Transparent progress from concept to viral marketing platform
roadmap.currentStatusDesc: We're currently in Phase 3: Beta Launch. We have a working prototype with Prototype UI, functional API, and trained AI model. Now perfecting organic logo integration.
roadmap.phase2Item1: Basic UI for photo upload and theme selection
roadmap.phase2Item2: API development for AI model integration
roadmap.phase2Item3: AI model training for photo transformation
roadmap.phase4Item2: Trending templates and short video generation
roadmap.phase4Item3: Focus on virality and user growth

techstack.title: Powered by

techstack.ai1Desc: Advanced diffusion models and GANs for high-quality photo transformation and artistic style transfer
techstack.ai2Desc: Seamless, contextual brand logo placement that looks like part of the original artwork
techstack.ai3Desc: Custom model training for diverse photo inputs and consistent high-quality artistic output
